Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Not bad considering how early in the season it is. some grassy spots that you can get around easily. the loop behind Bucks is real nice for skating. not enough snow for tracks though. some areas do have leaves but not terrible. worth going, enjoy!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob is not yet open for its down hill program : coming this weekend . But the groomers jumped the gun on the Nordic Trails . Access through Valley road to the red and blue loops are currently primo !

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 4 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails are open and in excellent condition. The upper trails were power-tilled and tracked yesterday and the lower trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.comments:
It's a beautiful day to be a skier at Nub's Nob. All of the runs on the frontside are open today with the exception of the glades. The snow is groomed corduroy with a nice dusting of natural snow on top. The temperature will remain below 25 degrees today but the wind is light and should make for comfortable skiing. The lifts will turn from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. There is a mini park at the bottom of Dories Bowl. The soup du jour is cheddar asparagus. The cross country trails are freshly groomed. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.

We will be open daily for skiing and riding beginning on December 12.
